original: Björcke, Paul Werner, verkställande direktör, Linköping, f. 22/10/97 i Sur-teby, Älvsb. 1. G. 30 m. Linnéa Ry-lander. Barn: Ingela f. 38. — Ge-nomg. Filip Holmqvists hand :inst. i Gbg. Anst. h. A. C. Bergström i Värö-backa 12-16, i A-B Barth. Dahlgren i Gbg 17, A-B Nord. Kullager i Gbg 18-22, å jub :utstäMn. i Gbg (23) 22-24, Iwar Jansson Kolonialv. A-B i Gbg 25-29, Västsv. AHm. Rest. A-B i Gbg 29-44, dir. i Östra Sv:es Allm. Rest. A-B i Linköping sed. 44. Led. av styr. f. Östra Sv:es Allm. Rest. A-B 45, led. av kontr:deleg. f. Östra Mellansverige sed. 45, led. av styr. f. Söderköp. Hotell A-B sed. 46, suppl. i styr. f. Arb :-giv:fören. f. hotell o. rest. 45. Hobby: jakt.
translated: Björcke, Paul Werner, CEO, Linköping, b. 22/10/97 in Sur-teby, Älvsb. Married in 1930 to Linnéa Rylander. Children: Ingela b. 1938. Started career at Filip Holmqvist's institute in Gothenburg. Worked at H.A.C. Bergström in Värö-backa from 1912-1916, A-B Barth. Dahlgren in Gothenburg in 1917, A-B Nord. Kullager in Gothenburg from 1918-1922, at the Jubilee exhibition in Gothenburg from 1922-1924, Iwar Jansson Kolonialv. A-B in Gothenburg from 1925-1929, and Västsv. AHm. Rest. A-B in Gothenburg from 1929-1944, then became director of Östra Sv:es Allm. Rest. A-B in Linköping since 1944. Member of the board of Östra Sv:es Allm. Rest. A-B since 1945, member of the contracting delegation for Östra Mellansverige since 1945, member of the board of Söderköp. Hotel A-B since 1946, and board member of the Employers' Association for hotels and restaurants since 1945. Hobbies include hunting.

memberOf.name: Employers' Association for hotels and restaurants

alumniOf.name: Östra Sv:es Allm. Rest. A-B, Linköping
